Description: The car can combine the location signals from several satelite oistioning systems lile GPS and BeiDou
The can recognizes specific stickers put on the streets. The sticker acts like a QR code which gives the global location. The car then calculate its position relative to the sticker
The car identify and record some places and combine it to the map. Then it can localize itself later
The car will read the alcohol level of the driver if the driver wants to switch to manual mode
The car can identify pedestrians using sensors and LIDAR

Concept Title: Identification system for cars and pedestrians
Description: The car can detect and identify carrs; motor bike and pedestrains
When the AV stops at a cross or stop sign; it should brake previously so the pedestrain would not be threatened
Cars can recieve the cell phone signals from pedestrains who are about to cross the road and slow down accordingly
Safety is one of the biggest concerns from potential users. GPS; Lidar and Camera fusion enable the AV to jave more accirate localization and positiong which enhances user's safety
The car can float on warter instead of sink in to the water
The car can detect and identify traffic signs and signals to avoid violate traffic rules
If a certain passenger has a heart attack or something like this; the car can report and call 911
The car can identify the user by using face recognition based on stored pictures (NOT limited to 1 person)
The car can calculates how bad and frequent the car has "mini-slip" in the rain or snow. Then the car wanrs the driver to slow down or stop for a while.
The car knows the location for every charging facilities. It will warn the user if the destination does not have any charging facilities nearby that reachable with the remaining fuel
The car diagnosed itself on daily basis. If something wrong is detected; the car warns the user through the phone to check some specific parts of the car
The car collects data of speed limit in every possible road and adjust the autodriving to follow the speed limit
The car can report emergency automatically
The car will autonomatically send the location to the police department if it got broken into
The windshield is able to increase the outside brightness via image processing
There are airbags on the outside of the car to protect the car from collision
When meeting bad road conditions; the car can avoid it automatically
An autonomous vehicle should be affordable for ordinary people
Cars can recive the traffic report from other cars automatically. If a congestion is about to happen; the system will automatically reroute the approaching cars
Reducing the width of the car to have just one column of seats
The car interacts with traffic lights around the city. The traffic lights have sensors to detect heavy traffic or road construction. Then the car recalculate the optimal route.
The AV must be able to recognize the traffic jam in the route and change route plan autonomously to avoid traffic jam
All autonomous cars are connected so the traffic flow is optimized by themselves instead of traffic lights
Having a separate lane for autonomous vehicles like the carpool lane
This is away to physically have two vehicles at random connect together based on a common path they're taking; to improve energy efficiency
User can use cell phone to control AV remotely; including self-parking and call the AV from parking lot
The car can be set up to go to car wash by itself
The car can go and refuel or recharge itself during unoccupied time(or by order)
The user can pin point the pick up location and his AV will revieve the request and drive to the pick up point
The car can pick up passengers by their order and can park itself
The user should have the ability to call the vehicle from miles away using his phone
The car records the whole trip including the traffic condition. It will compare it to the estimated duration and choose alternate route if the route is more efficient
In case of auto-driving malfunction; the user is able to manually override the function and engage indriving
The car can change to manual riving mode according to the driver's command
The UI should be easy and friendly for ordinary people; especially for children; elder people and disabilities
The augmented reality can show the chosen path of an autonomous vehicle; helping the other interact with it
The car turns the inside surrounding into screen which becomes similar to VR
The car has an app that can share its location. Most like uber but more personal. For example; sharing it to family members you want to pick up somewhere
The car provides interactive tutorial system on every possible features
The car can record the marked favorite places like work; retaurants; uncle's house etc
Autonomous vehicle driver can use voice to iteract with AV and send command to AV
When meeting pedestrians; it can report the trend of the car by voice prompt
A signboard & a speaker system to communicate to pedestrians and other cars
A smart navigation system for autonomous cars to keep users engaged & Informed
The windshield with AR function enables the passengers to explore a world beyound reality
This car is easy for users to assemble. Also; it is easy to upgrade parts by having standarized parts.
The passengers will wear wear VR sets to experience an immersive riding thrill
Users are able to communicate with their cars with brainwave. Extremely helpful for disabled passengers.
A personal assistent will be projected with 3D hologram. User will be able to interact with a human look AI
AV will reduce light from outside and turn on inside light. The HMI would change from voice to screen message; The users can focys on work
AV's window would block all the outside light. Vehicle would wake user up when the vehicle arrive destination
The car has a transparent car cabin
The roof of the car will open wider for user to stargaze the night. It can also use a transparent glass mode instead of fully open
The car can dispatch umberlla from its side when it is raining if the user wants to get out of the car
The car can have a mini storage for cold drinks
The car has different settings saved for each user; and the user can activate it by phone. For example; Nancy likes the temperature in the car to be 75 while Matt likes it at 72.
Passengers can lay down and take a nap while their AV to their destination
Instead of lookubg through the window; passengers is able to change their views to other possible location
Users can order this service and the restaurant will send this AV loaded with food the users ordered can drive to user's preferable location
Passengers are able to enjoy their video on this massive screen while the AV driving them to their desination
The AV should have top entertainment system and give user the best travel experience. All the windows can be screen
The sleeping pod will help the user to relax since driving and effort is not required
Given that the vehicle is autonomous; the seats need not face front. Rotating seats allow for meetings; discussions etc.
The windshield has the option of being used as a screen to see movies or presentations
Passengers can change the seat layout without the consideration of driving
Since the user do not need to drive; the seats should be able to turn and slide flexibly
Passengers can rotate their seats to enjoy the front; side or back views and to use the center table for work
The car can change its exterior look depending on users preference
User can generate power by pedaling. When the vehicle runs out of energy; this can be a back up generator.
The car is able to turn without actually turning the wheels. The steering angle is 360 degrees
The owner can replace modules of the cars to fix them or get new features
For a motorcade; the car can follow the car in front of it automatically
The car can wash and clean itself
The car can find and locate some small problems of  itself
The car can fly to avoid traffic jam
The car should use signal light on the car to indicate its purpose.
The car has airbag outside of it. When the car crush pedestrians; teh airbag can protect pedestrians
AV provides gym facilities inside for users.
The floor holding the gas and brake pedals can rise up to be a footrest during autonomous functions
The car has a slope so the disnables in wheelchair can board the car with the slope
Each car seat's head rest can have an extension that fits into the user's ears and plays their select music
User can command the vehicle with brain wave and helmet
The steering wheel will come out from from the dashboard only when the autonomous function is disabled
Car seats can be designed to have hidden storage areas under them to protect against theft
The vehicle can transforms into robotics and get across obstacles
The car can have vaccum cleaners attached above the carpets and under the seats to have autocleaning function
Club decoration inside. Users can sing and dance in it
The seat can be made to have extensions to hold a baby. The extensions will come out only with a toggle of a switch
The car parts can be detached and can be put into a suit case to be carried around
The body parts of the car can be made easily detachable so that the user can plug and play with certain components
The car can use solar panels to power certain components to make the car more energy efficient
Manufacture the autonomous vehicle by 3D printing technology
Users can have a massage in the car
The solar panel on the top can collect solar energy and store it in the battery
With AR and plane instrument; users can experience plane pilot simulation.
